reviewText: This is educational for kids who have no clue about polio & what could happen to people. It gives pretty good pictures of the iron lung. Needed to deal more with how long Martha lived in that iron lung. She was quite a good role model for sick people who think they have it bad-her attitude was remarkable. I could not understand a lot of what she said-not good sound quality. Got this for an educational dvd.
This video is an additional emphasis of the truly greeatr spirit that Martha Mason lived and gave to others.  She is a major inspiration.
